bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Memorandum from A.S. Dabney to Commanding Officer, Army Medical Center, December 2, 1935

div1.p: Dabney requests a copy of the Commanding Officer's letter acknowledging the Walter Reed Memorial Association's request to house the Reed bust at the hospital.

div1.head: Memorandum from A.S. Dabney to Commanding Officer, Army Medical Center, December 2, 1935
div1.p:
War Dept., SGO, December 2, 1935 - To the Commanding Officer, Army Medical
Center, Washington, D. C.

2. It is requested that this office be furnished a copy of the
acknowledgment of this letter.
By order of The Surgeon General:
div1.closer:
/s/ A. S. Dabney
A. S. Dabney,
Major, Medical Corps,
Executive Officer. RECEIVED
Dec 3 1935
Hq. Army Medical Center
Washington, D. C.
ARMY MEDICAL CENTER WASHINGTON, D.C.
----
OFFICIAL
----
